short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Source candidates to Trakstar Hire with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add prospects to Trakstar hire with one click.

Add prospects from -

1. LinkedIn (including Recruiter account)
2. GitHub
3. AngelList
4. Behance

All key info such as 

1. First Name
2. Last Name
3. Email (if available)
4. Profile Link

and more will be imported into your candidate profile in Trakstar hire
